attributes.action: Confirm the UKs commitment to full membership of the EU and its institutions
attributes.additional_details: The 1975 Referendum on membership of the then European Economic Community (now the EU) overwhelmingly confirmed the UK membership of the EU and its institutions. Recognising that in a complex and changing World, the EU enables the UK to play a substantial role in World affairs not available as a single country, the Government should unambigously commit itself to play a major and positive role within the EU and all its institutions
